events.message: The customer reported a minor car collision that occurred on 2024-04-30 at an intersection downtown.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident after reviewing the initial claim details and accident report.
An agent specializing in vehicle collision claims has been assigned to manage the customer's case.
The customer received official acknowledgment of the claim submission within one business day, confirming next steps.
Requested all relevant documents including police report, photos of the car damage, and proof of insurance.
The customer provided all requested documents promptly, including detailed pictures and the official police report.
The investigation team began reviewing the submitted files, inspecting the vehicle condition and accident circumstances.
Investigation completed confirming liability on the other party, and damage assessment has been finalized.
A settlement offer was proposed covering both vehicle repairs and the rental car expenses during repair.
The customer expressed satisfaction with the quick settlement proposal and clear communication throughout the process.
The claim was fully approved after the customer's acceptance of the proposed settlement terms.
Payment for the approved claim, covering all repairs and additional expenses, was issued promptly to the customer.
The claim was officially closed following successful payment and confirmation that repairs were completed satisfactorily.
All claim records including communications and payment details were archived securely in accordance with company policy.
